remarks: A product metric of extended metrics is an extended metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsds.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsds.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsds.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsds.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsds.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsds.p $e |- P = ( dist ` T ) $.
xpsds.m $e |- M = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
xpsds.n $e |- N = ( ( dist ` S ) |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
xpsds.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
xpsds.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) $.
xpsxmet $p |- ( ph -> P e. ( *Met ` ( X X. Y ) ) ) $.
